body: everybody is talking about ntr. But I was looking for femdom. I can’t enjoy femdom without protagonists loving each other. Also, there’re also other doujins talking about gf fulfill her bf’s fetish of being victim of ntr, but finally they still love each other. Can someone tell me how should I enjoy this? There should be some charms within this kind of topic

Well I liked it, but then again I only really read things I like. People who do otherwise seem to be.. well, a bit undeveloped, and uneducated- young and immature. Later on in your life, you will figure it out. Essentially, there are these things called "sexual tastes" and everybody has them and they are wildly diverse, have to do with Jungian archetypes which boil back to evolutionary strategies. Anyway, getting down on a person for their tastes is just dumb. So is reading something you don't like, expecting it to be different from what was advertised! :)  When you graduate from highschool I bet you'll understand.
